line_1: At least to Men of small Discerning.
line_2: O Friend! I could display much Learning,
Both in good liquor and good learning;

line_1: So fam'd for his talent in nicely discerning.
line_2: With a great deal of skill, and a wig full of learning,
But how to spend next tedious morning,

line_1: That Sage was surely more discerning,
line_2: Who taught to play us into Learning,
Right. Athens was the seat of learning,
